lom:description.lom:string: This collection contains images (thumbnails plus high resolution) and simulations. Many have related publications or text that explain how the images were obtained and associated research. Submitted by researchers associated with The Glotzer Group at the University of Michigan.

lom:title.lom:string: Lab for Computational Nanoscience and Soft Matter Simulation (2006)
